## AuthCommandApi interface

Describes an object that can be used to handle external api commmands

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthCommandApi<TBody, TResponse> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiUrl](./state-auth.authcommandapi.apiurl.md) | string | The api url pointing to external api endpoint |
|  [bodyFormatter?](./state-auth.authcommandapi.bodyformatter.md) | (t: TBody) =&gt; unknown | <i>(Optional)</i> Used to format the body according to requirements of the external api |
|  [method](./state-auth.authcommandapi.method.md) | string | The http method used |
|  [responseFormatter?](./state-auth.authcommandapi.responseformatter.md) | (t: unknown) =&gt; TResponse | <i>(Optional)</i> Used to format the external api response according to the specified response type |
